tool.name: qiime2 sample-classifier predict-classification
tool.description: Use trained classifier to predict target values for new samples.

param.name: table
param.label: table: FeatureTable[Frequency | RelativeFrequency | PresenceAbsence | Composition]
param.help: [required] Feature table containing all features that should be used for target prediction.

tool.help:
QIIME 2: sample-classifier predict-classification ================================================= Use trained classifier to predict target values for new samples.
Outputs: -------- :predictions.qza: Predicted target values for each input sample. :probabilities.qza: Predicted class probabilities for each input sample.
|
Description: ------------ Use trained estimator to predict target values for new samples. These will typically be unseen samples, e.g., test data (derived manually or from split_table) or samples with unknown values, but can theoretically be any samples present in a feature table that contain overlapping features with the feature table used to train the estimator.
|
